headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. - TTWO
summary: NEW YORK, May 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP is investigating claims on behalf of investors of Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. .  Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...

headline: Take-Two (TTWO) Q4 Earnings Preview: What You Should Know Beyond the Headline Estimates
summary: Evaluate the expected performance of Take-Two (TTWO) for the quarter ended March 2025, looking beyond the conventional Wall Street top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining some of its key metrics for better insight.

headline: Videogame publishers rush to seize fall launch window after 'GTA VI' delay
summary: Days after Take-Two Interactivedelayed the launch of Grand Theft Auto VI to May next year,rival publishers are using that opportunity to lock in releasedates for their games to avoid a direct clash...
